text: Michael Tait Moran is an English professional footballer who plays as a forward for club Aston Villa. Tait is a product of the Aston Villa Academy. ==Club career== Tait started training with Aston Villa at the age of seven and progressed through their academy sides, he signed his first professional contract in September 2019 aged 17, a two-year deal following a strong start to the season where he scored seven goals at youth level. ===Aston Villa=== Tait made his professional debut for Aston Villa in the 2019-20 EFL Trophy, starting in a 2-0 away defeat at Salford City. ==References== Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:2001 births Category:Association football forwards
title: Michael Tait (footballer)
